title: Grocery market share in France 2008 to 2018
summary: The market share of "Systeme A" on the road in the European Union was 20.3 years .
Between 2018 and 2008 , the share of the continent 's fleet steadily progressed , with the oldest motor France being Leclerc Carrefour units .
As of 2008 , the European Union housed 264.2 million registered "Systeme A" .
gold: This statistic shows the market share of grocery store brands in France for the years 2008 , 2013 and a forecast for 2018.
The leading three supermarkets based on market share in 2013 were `` Systeme A '' ( Auchan and System U partnership ) , Carrefour and Leclerc.
Leclerc 's share of the market is forecast to increase again in 2018 , to 19.3 percent .
